1 #!/usr/bin/env python3
2 
3 from hrc_ros.srv import *
4 import rospy
5 import pymorse
6 
7 def handleMovePackage(req):
8  success = True
9  try:
10  with pymorse.Morse() as sim:
11  sim.rpc('simulation', 'set_object_position', req.package_id, [req.x, req.y, req.z])
12  except:
13  success = False
14  rospy.logdebug("[Package Manipulator]: MoveNewPackage {} success: {}!".format(req.package_id, success))
15  return MoveNewPackageResponse(success)
16 
17 def addMovePackageServer():
18  s = rospy.Service('~move_new_package', MoveNewPackage, handleMovePackage)
19 
20 if __name__ == "__main__":
21  rospy.init_node('package_manipulator')
22  addMovePackageServer()
23  rospy.loginfo("PackageManipulator ready!")
24  rospy.spin()
